3 LineValidationTable::LineValidationTable(int line_code,Point origin,float search_direction, int next_direction_distance, Point adjacent_point_1, Point adjacent_point_2, int label)
4 {
5  origin_ = origin;
6  line_code_ = line_code;
7  label_ = label;
8 
9  search_direction_ = search_direction;
10  next_direction_distance_ = next_direction_distance;
11 
12 
13  switch(line_code)
14  {
15  case LEFT_LINE:
16  mid_point_ = adjacent_point_1;
17  right_point_ = adjacent_point_2;
18  break;
19  case MID_LINE:
20  left_point_ = adjacent_point_1;
21  right_point_ = adjacent_point_2;
22  break;
23  case RIGHT_LINE:
24  left_point_ = adjacent_point_1;
25  mid_point_ = adjacent_point_2;
26  break;
27  }
28 
29  left_id_ = -1;
30  mid_id_ = -1;
31  right_id_ = -1;
32 
33 
34  left_prediction_ = false;
35  mid_prediction_ = false;
36  right_prediction_ = false;
37 
38  left_to_mid_directions_in_range_ = false;
39  left_to_right_directions_in_range_ = false;
40  mid_to_left_directions_in_range_ = false;
41  mid_to_right_directions_in_range_ = false;
42  right_to_left_directions_in_range_ = false;
43  right_to_mid_directions_in_range_ = false;
44 
45 
46  left_to_origin_prediction_ = false;
47  mid_to_origin_prediction_ = false;
48  right_to_origin_prediction_ = false;
49 
50 
51  found_left_point_ = false;
52  found_mid_point_ = false;
53  found_right_point_ = false;
54 
55  score_ = 0;
56 }
57 
58 Point LineValidationTable::GetAdjacentPointPrediction(int SEARCH_LINE_CODE)
59 {
60  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == LEFT_TO_MID) return mid_point_;
61 
62  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == LEFT_TO_RIGHT) return right_point_;
63 
64  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == MID_TO_LEFT) return left_point_;
65 
66  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == MID_TO_RIGHT) return right_point_;
67 
68  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == RIGHT_TO_LEFT) return left_point_;
69 
70  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == RIGHT_TO_MID) return mid_point_;
71  }
72

74 void LineValidationTable::SetAdjacentPointPredictionFound(int SEARCH_LINE_CODE, bool flag)
75 {
76  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == LEFT_TO_MID) found_mid_point_ = flag;
77 
78  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == LEFT_TO_RIGHT) found_right_point_ = flag;
79 
80  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == MID_TO_LEFT) found_left_point_ = flag;
81 
82  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == MID_TO_RIGHT) found_right_point_ = flag;
83 
84  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == RIGHT_TO_LEFT) found_left_point_ = flag;
85 
86  if(SEARCH_LINE_CODE == RIGHT_TO_MID) found_mid_point_ = flag;
87 }
